arts.ttl: Salvation match between Cagliari and Lecce
arts.sum: He has found the net in the last two matches, and in the era of three points for a win only one Cagliari player (excluding strikers) has scored in three consecutive games played in Serie A: Radja Nainggolan between November and December 2019. After the 1-0 success in the reverse fixture on last 31 August, Lecce could win both seasonal matches against Cagliari for the first time in Serie A.
